title: Switch MCP health checks from HTTP to TCP connect

comment: PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All 12 required CR sections present and substantive. Frontmatter verified: title="Switch MCP health checks from HTTP to TCP connect", revision_summary="Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 executable document). No placeholder content in pre-approved sections (1-9). Execution sections (10-11) contain expected execution-phase placeholders. No typos, formatting errors, or TBD/TODO/FIXME markers found. Traceability to CR-088 and governing SOPs confirmed. EI table correctly structured with pre/post baseline commits per SOP-004 Section 5, and VR flag on EI-2 for integration verification. SDLC prerequisites N/A (Agent Hub is not SDLC-governed). No TU assignment required -- affected domain (Agent Hub service management) is outside all TU specializations (tu_ui, tu_scene, tu_sketch, tu_sim). Recommend for pre-approval.

POST-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All post-review criteria per SOP-002 Section 7.3 and SOP-004 Section 10 verified with evidence. (1) Execution Complete: All 3 EIs show Task Outcome Pass — EI-1 baseline commit a0c856c, EI-2 implementation commit c1477f8, EI-3 post-execution commit e509a07. (2) No VARs created (no Fail outcomes). (3) No controlled documents modified — Section 7.2 confirms "None." (4) Evidence documented in all Execution Summary fields with commit hashes and narratives. (5) SDLC N/A — Agent Hub is not SDLC-governed. (6) VR Complete: EI-2 VR column updated from "Yes" to "CR-090-VR-001". VR content verified against SOP-004 Section 9C.4 — all required sections present (Identification, Objective, Pre-Conditions, Procedure, Observations, Outcome, Signature). Evidence is observational (exact commands and copy-pasted terminal output), contemporaneous (same-day create/checkin), and reproducible (pre-conditions and exact commands specified). VR checked in and not checked out. Execution sections contain no remaining placeholders. Pre-approved content (Sections 1-9) unchanged. Frontmatter verified: CR title="Switch MCP health checks from HTTP to TCP connect", VR title="Integration verification: TCP connect health checks". Recommend for post-approval.
